<h1 align="center">
  Vršac Info 
</h1>

Vršac Info is a news blog website built for local journalist. For the frontend side, I used [GatsbyJS](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/) and for content management, I went with [Sanity](https://www.sanity.io/).

## 💻 Stacks & Tools:

- GatsbyJS
- GraphQL
- Sass
- Material UI
- Sanity
- Netlify
